$  min,
$  max,
$  int = false 
) [static]

Ensures a number is in a specified range.

This method forces the specified number into the boundaries of a minimum and maximum number.

Parameters:
numbe The number to check
number The minimum value
number The maximum value
boolean Evaluates the number as an integer
Returns:
number A number in the specified range
